reason: Witnessing an overdose can be traumatizing and indicates the presence of drug use in the area. The individual is seeking Narcan, indicating a concern about potential future overdoses, suggesting a risk of repeated exposure or potential involvement.

title: User Story: Self-Harm
content: Ugh, bad day. The urges are strong. Just trying to breathe and remember this feeling will pass. Anyone else relate? How do you cope?
reason: The text indicates strong urges and a desire to cope, suggesting distress and potential for self-harm, though the specific nature of the urges is unclear. The user is reaching out, indicating a possible willingness to seek help, but the strength of the urges elevates the risk above 'low'.

title: User Story: Abuse
